resources.string: Welcome to your lecture room finder
You can start/stop logging your location
You can create a geofence for a location
Access to coarse location is required for faster first fix.
No access to locations. Time to first fix may be severely delayed!
Enter a longitude and latitude and click on \'Alert\' to get notified when you\'re close to the location
Get notified when you\'re close to a location of your choice
You\'re in range of your desired location
